code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Quiz(){const[score,setScore]=useState(0);const[answered,setAnswered]=useState(false);const handleAnswer=isCorrect=>{if(!answered){setAnswered(true);if(isCorrect){setScore(score+1);}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Quiz: Test Your Knowledge"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"What is a qubit?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAnswer(true),children:"A quantum bit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAnswer(false),children:"A classical bit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Current score: ",score]})]});}export default Quiz;
